item.description: Jan 28th 9:00-10:15am Join Katie West at The Levity Institute for a refreshing and opening 1.5 hour class in which we engage in the practices of intentional laughter and silence. This is a very restorative class and which offers practical ways to integrate more laughter as well as quiet into your daily life.
item.how_to_find_us: We are across from Scratch Bakery and above Willard Scoops Ice cream shop in Willard Square(go up stairs on RIght side of building)
item.name: Laughter and Silence Meditation
